point.text: Take pot on counter | and fill it with water from the sink | . Place the pot on a burner on the stove | . Turn on the burner | and let the water boil | . Once it is boiling, | open the lid of the ramen cup | and pour boiling water in until it reaches the top of the container | .
Fill the mug with water from the sink | and put it into the microwave oven | . Turn on the oven | for 10minutes .
Put the game into the Xbox, | connect xbox to television | . Turn on the television | . Move the couch so that it's in front of the Xbox | . .

If anything is disposable and used, put it in the trash bag | . If it is not disposable and on the floor, put it on the table nearest any items associated with it If it is not disposable and on the floor, put it on the table nearest any items associated with it | If it is not disposable and on the floor, put it on the table nearest any items associated with it . If a not disposable item contains only disposable objects, dump them into the trash bag, | and treat the object | like it was on the floor | . Remove the trash bag from the scenario | .
Put the book on the table | . Shut down the TV | . Put away the coke and the beer | .
Turn on the music | . Place beer and chips onto the table | . Pour chips into the bowl . Move all furniture to the sides of the room | . .

Grab the ramen on the table | . Go to the sink, | fill the ramen cup with water | up to the indicated line | . Put into the microwave and microwave for 3 minutes | Put into the microwave and microwave for 3 minutes . .

Boil some water | and make some coffee | . Find a white bowl | . Take ice cream out of the freezer | . Put coffee into the white bowl, | then put two scoops of ice cream | over that . Finally, take the syrup on the counter | and drizzle it over the ice cream | . .
grasp the pot | . Toggle the sink | and fill the pot | . Place pot on front left stove | . Toggle front left stove | .
Grab plates and cups | and bring | to sink | . Put ice cream in freezer | .
Have | some drink and food being | served | .
Pick up the game | and put it in the xbox | . Take the bag of chips and the bowl | and place them on the coffee table | . Move the couch closer to the television | .
Dispose of trash . Dispose of can . Place Guiness Book on table | .
Fill the pot with water in the sink the boil it on the stove | .

Turn TV | on with remote and find movie (Lincoln) | on with remote and find movie (Lincoln) . Take bag of chips | and place on table | . Take pillow from shelf and place on a sofa | . Throw away beer and soda, | and place Book of Records on shelf | with brown book . .
Take boiled egg from fridge | . Peel | and throw out shell | . Put on plate | . Take plate along with the mug with coffee in it to hungry person | . .
Turn off the TV | . Put the Bag of Chips on the shelf | . Also, put the beer, the coke and the bowl on the shelf | . Look for books | and if you find any put them on the table | .
grasp far cry and xbox | . drop near tv | . grasp bowl and place on table . move couch near tv | . .
Turn on the music | . Bring us chips and coke | . Bring us the controller | .
put xbox and xbox controller into the TV | stand . Throw the trash bag into the garbage bin | . .
Put the pillows on the couch | . Turn on the TV | and change it to a channel with a movie | . Take beer | and put it on the table in front of the couch | .

Grab the ramen on the table | . Go to the sink, | fill the ramen cup with water | up to the indicated line | . Put into the microwave and microwave for 3 minutes | Put into the microwave and microwave for 3 minutes . .
Fill pot with water | . Put pot on stove | . Turn stove | on .
Place the ice cream in the freezer | . Place all syrup bottles in the fridge | . Take all pots, cups, plates, and silverware | and put them in the sink | . .
Make some coffee | . Make some eggs on the stove | and then put them on a plate | and serve the eggs and coffee | to me .
Turn on xbox | . Take a Game CD | and put in xbox | . Throw out beer, coke, and sketchy stuff in bowl | . Take pillows from shelf | and distribute among couches | . .

Open freezer, | remove icecream, | close freezer | . Get spoon and plate, | open ice cream, | scoop | and place on plate, | close ice cream, | replace in fridge | . Get mug with coffee | and pour over ice cream | . Place mug in sink . Get chocolate syrup | and pump over ice cream | . .
Take the pot that already has some water in it | . Put it on one of the burners, | and turn it | on . .
Put the used dishes and cups in the sink | and place all the items neatly on the counter and place all the items neatly on the counter | .
Pick up the game | and put it in the xbox | . Take the bag of chips and the bowl | and place them on the coffee table | . Move the couch closer to the television | .
Put all the school books on the table | . Turn off the tv | and pour some chips and drinks | .
Turn the TV | on and change the channel to one with music | . Get food | and put it on the coffee table | . Pick up the controller on the floor and place on the table | . Throw out the bottle | . .

gather ingredients (egg from fridge, ramen from counter) microwave water in cup, | or boil water in pot | (process described in previous scenario) | . Pour boiling water in ramen cup | after opening the cup | and removing soup base | . pour soup base | . Peel egg | and add | to ramen and throw shell in trash | . .
Take | coffee pot pour into the mug | . Take | spoon from counter scoop the ice cream | . Put ice cream to the mug | . Pour syrup to the mug | .
Take coffee from the container | . Pour coffee to the mug | . Take | the spoon scoop the ice cream | . Put the ice cream in the mug | . Pour syrup on the ice cream | .
Grasp the pot | and walk to the sink | . Toggle the tap | to fill the pot | . Put the pot on the stove | . Turn on the burner | . Turn off the burner | when the water is boiling | . .
Gather all cups, plates, mugs, and utensils | and put them in the sink one at a time | .
Take | pot | . Fill it with water from the sink | . Put it on the already lit | burner . Wait | until it boils . .
Prepare drinks and food | .Serve the people | when they come in .
Put the dishes in the sink, | put all perishable foods in the refrigerator, | and put the pots and utensils in the sink | .
Take the game | and put it in the xbox, | turn on the TV | and arrange the couches around the TV | .
Turn off the TV, | put all the pillows back on the top shelf, | empty the contents of the bowl, | throw out empty bottles and cans, | and take out the trash | .

Open fridge and freezer | and pick a drink | . Remove boiled egg | as well and place on plate | . Pour said drink in a long cup or mug | . Bring cup, plate, and possibly salt to whomever is eating, with plate | in one hand and drink in the other . .
grasp cd put in xbox | . grasp bag of chips | . grasp trash | .

clear all tables and the floor | and put the contents on the shelves | . Take any drinks | and put them on the coffee table | . Take the chip bowl | and place it near the drinks | . Open the chips, | and pour them into the chip bowl until it | is full . Place the bag near the bowl | . Change the TV channel until a dance music themed station | is found | . Turn the volume | to full . Move all chairs and tables to the edge of the room | . Make sure the chairs are rotated so that they face the room's center | . .

Place the Xbox and Xbox controller | underneath the television console . Place | all of the couches on one side of the wall, preferably facing the television | . Place all of the beer and bags of chips on the white counter | . Place the garbage bin near the white counter | . Place the trash bag inside the garbage bin | . Turn on the television | to channel | 3 and increase the volume | to 50 . Place the CD's on a shelf | . Place | the coke can on the counter along with the beer and chips | . .
Turn off the TV | . Grasp the brown book to the table in front of the couch | . .
take the coffee | and then mix with ice cream and syrup | .

Make coffee | . Take a bowl, ice cream scoop, | and ice cream . Use | the ice cream scoop | to add ice cream to the bowl | twice . Slowly pour the finished coffee into the bowl | . Get the syrup | and squirt two tablespoons on top | . serve with a spoon | .

Take the mug in the microwave | and go to the sink | and add water to it | . After there is water in the mug put the mug back in the microwave and set it to no more than 3 minutes After there is water in the mug put the mug back in the microwave and set it to no more than 3 minutes | .
Put away the chocolate syrup | . Place the glassware and mugs into the sink | . Put the pots | away . .

Dump the coffee in the mug in the sink, | put all perishable items in the refrigerator, | put all the dishes, utensils, and pots in the sink | . .

Grab the game cd | . Place the cd in the xbox | . Prepare us food | and bring the coke | . Take the pillow from the shelf | and put it to the couch | .

Place both books on the center table | . Hold the trash bag in one hand | and place the plate inside the bag | . Place the empty coke can, beer, and bag of chips into the trash | bag . Arrange the couches | in the correct locations in the living room | . Pick up Guiness book from the floor and place on desk | . turn off the lamp | . Place the three pillows on the couches | . .
Put everything on the table onto the shelves | . Place chip bag in garbage | bag . Take out garbage | . .

Open the game CD with TV | . Put xbox and its controller in the shelf under the TV | . Pour chips into the bowl | and throw the container into the trash bag | . Put drinks and food on the middle of the table in front of coaches | . Put pillows onto the coaches, | one for each . Arrange coaches around the big table . Put books on the study desk | .
